definition: having the leading position or higher score in a contest, at or in the front
details:
adjective
- having the leading position or higher score in a contest
= synonyms: in the lead
adverb
- at or in the front
= example: at or in the front
= synonyms: before
- ahead of time
= synonyms: in advance, beforehand
- in a forward direction
= example: in a forward direction
= synonyms: forwards
- leading or ahead in a competition
= example: leading or ahead in a competition
= synonyms: out front
- to a different or a more advanced time (meaning advanced either toward the present or toward the future)
= example: to a different or a more advanced time (meaning advanced either toward the present or toward the future)
- to a more advanced or advantageous position
= example: to a more advanced or advantageous position
- toward the future
= synonyms: forward
